name: Sugar Rush! (Fmlad)
description:
Submission for the Minijam 88; Rush where you must tell a story without text.

( This game is quite buggy and does not have an ending, sadly I ran out of time )

Thank you for taking the time to play my submission.

Controls:
-> WASD for movement.
-> Mouse click anywhere on screen for most interactions (unless stated otherwise)

How to play:
-> Pick lemons from the trees (they grow pretty fast)
-> Cut them up into slices
-> Mix to make your lemonade
-> Sell to Interested customers
-> Make as much money by day 5 ( currently bug is stopping the end from happening )
-> kick the snails away, they eat your lemons from the tree..

Known Issue:
-> Cakes & Cookies were coded in but not showing due to bug
-> Day 5 should be the ending however It was not initiating correctly at the time.

"Manor" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
